business_definition: Communication area for CardDemo application programs, containing general information, customer details, account information, card data, and navigation context
Group containing general transaction and user information including transaction routing, user identification, and program context
Transaction ID of the originating transaction
Program name of the originating program
Transaction ID of the target transaction
Program name of the target program
User identification code
User type indicator - A for Admin or U for User
Condition name indicating administrator user type (VALUE 'A')
Condition name indicating regular user type (VALUE 'U')
Program context indicator - 0 for initial entry or 1 for re-entry
Condition name indicating initial program entry (VALUE 0)
Condition name indicating program re-entry (VALUE 1)
Group containing customer identification and name information
Customer identification number
Customer first name
Customer middle name
Customer last name
Group containing account identification and status information
Account identification number
Account status code
Group containing card information
Card number - 16 digit credit card number
Group containing additional navigation and screen information
Last map name used in the transaction flow
Last mapset name used in the transaction flow
